name: AUDIOCITY
description:
This rhythm game revolves around hitting notes to the beat of the song using two swords, one is black and the other - white. The player must react quickly to choose the correct sword to hit the notes with. The black notes have to be hit by the black sword, and the white notes with the white sword.

This game features different charts, and the user is able to create their own charts using their own audio files using the built-in editor or add charts that other people have made in the past.

Left click, O - Use white sword

Right click, P - Use black sword

Up, W - Move to the upper lane

Down, S - Move to the lower lane
